channel.title: RESIST : demo loop - Boinerz [Progressive indie rock, M4a format]
channel.description:
[RESIST. demo loop](https://www.dropbox.com/s/q8wwnos6epky68q/Resist.m4a?dl=0)
EXPERIENCE IN RENOISE helped me get into AUXY. I USE iPhone but benefit from the interface. I CAN see where a notepad would be nice.
PITCH BENDING , midi import would be nice features. ALSO PROVIDE some tips on LINKED applications. I HAVE overcome some of the restrictive Apple domain encumbrances. CREATING YOUR own music happens in privacy that is dificult to break out of... GIF apps won’t allow your own music, its a battle to get past some of the blockage.
I HAVE allot more of this project in A-flat, the demo is like the chorus fade out ending. I COULD take some pieces & build something of a bridge...![image|690x386](upload://xXQfJgqeCOWBbjziJNUGs8euZkr.jpeg)

item.title: RESIST : demo loop - Boinerz [Progressive indie rock, M4a format]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Indigoo:

But uh… what’s the difference?

Getting MIDI generated inside Auxy out of Auxy = MIDI export (supported)
Getting MIDI generated outside of Auxy into Auxy = MIDI import (not supported)

Read full topic

item.source: RESIST : demo loop - Boinerz [Progressive indie rock, M4a format]

item.title: RESIST : demo loop - Boinerz [Progressive indie rock, M4a format]
item.dc:creator: Boinerz
item.description:
I HAVE automation. THERE’S WORK to do making subtle changes to filters & volume, it’s more than what I needed to get into at this point. I HAVE worked on the mix to combine the Flag & Lead Fragment voices. THIS PIECE is potentially my most important contribution to musical art. AUXY HAS a nice way of allowing a different, process with more experimentation. I PREFER sounds that are real instruments, provokes wonder if it is performed, or could be performed. I AM not much impressed with ZANY, overwhelming SOUND. THE ART is dynamic, potentially helpful in bringing people together as activists. THERE IS so much, & it best, I think communicates emotion words cannot. BUT THEN you know that, of course.

AM COOKING a French theme. RESIST MIGHT use imagery from the occupation. SASSY MONKEY is my first AUXY piece, “metro jazz.”
https://app.auxy.co/projects/QvlGsdQjN0YcONhuMuWtrw==
SASSY MONKEY link VERY CLEAN. I’ll post it in iTunes Share somehow. HAVE HAD iPhone 2 months.

Read full topic

item.title: RESIST : demo loop - Boinerz [Progressive indie rock, M4a format]
item.dc:creator: Trey
item.description:
If you have not found automation yet, then I would definitely suggest it as it’s crucial to any song. Click the smaller rectangle with a + inside of it below your regular music loops.
Here you can change volume, low pass highpass, pitch and quite a few other very cool features.

Read full topic

item.title: RESIST : demo loop - Boinerz [Progressive indie rock, M4a format]
item.dc:creator: Boinerz
item.description:
RESIST. demo loop

EXPERIENCE IN RENOISE helped me get into AUXY. I USE iPhone but benefit from the interface. I CAN see where a notepad would be nice.

PITCH BENDING , midi import would be nice features. ALSO PROVIDE some tips on LINKED applications. I HAVE overcome some of the restrictive Apple domain encumbrances. CREATING YOUR own music happens in privacy that is dificult to break out of… GIF apps won’t allow your own music, its a battle to get past some of the blockage.

I HAVE allot more of this project in A-flat, the demo is like the chorus fade out ending. I COULD take some pieces & build something of a bridge…
